caption.p: Geographical distribution of hotspots of potentially suitable climatic conditions for 783 ornamental species not yet naturalized in, but somewhere outside of Europe, under current climate (a) and three scenarios of climate warming: (b) mild scenario (RCP2.6), (c) intermediate scenario (RCP4.5) and (d) strong scenario (RCP8.5).
